鮨科 [ qí kē ]: the grouper family; Serranidae (fish family including Epinephelinae or grouper 石斑鱼 )
Pictophonetic: 旨 indicates the sound; 魚 (fish) conveys the meaning.
Freq: 7927

鮨字的基本解释

鮨
yì
鱼，体细长而侧扁，红色或褐色，有斑纹。口大，可以伸缩，牙细而尖。生活于海洋中，有的进入淡水。
古指鲵鱼：“（北嶽之山）诸怀之水出焉……其中多鮨鱼。鱼身而犬首，其音如婴儿。”

鮨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》渠脂切，平脂，羣。］
(1)鱼酱。
(2)细切的肉。
[②]［yì］
［《集韻》研計切，去霽，疑。］
(1)古代传说中一种类似鲵鱼的鱼。
(2)鱼类的一科。体侧扁，红色或褐色，有斑纹。口大，牙尖细。生活于海洋。

鮨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮨； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第17
〔古文〕䱈【唐韻】旨夷切【集韻】蒸夷切，?音脂。【說文】魚䏽醬也，出蜀中。一曰鮪魚名。又【集韻】市之切，音時。義同。又【廣韻】渠脂切【集韻】渠伊切，?音祁。鮓也。【爾雅·釋器】魚謂之鮨。【註】鮓屬也。【類篇】或作?。又【集韻】研計切，音詣。魚名。【山海經】諸懷之水西流注于囂水，其中多鮨魚而大首，其音如嬰兒，食之已狂。

鮨字的起名意思

暂无。

Serrano
Basic explanation of words
Serrano
yì
Fish, slender body and flat side, red or brown, with markings. The mouth is large, flexible, and the teeth are thin and pointed. Live in the ocean, and some enter fresh water.
Ancient refers to salamander: "(Mountain of Beiyue) The water of Zhuhuai comes out of Yan... Among them are many serrata. The body of the fish is the head of the dog, and the sound is like a baby."
Serrano
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" Quzhi cut, flat fat, group. ]
(1) Fish sauce.
(2) Finely sliced meat.
[②]［yì］
["Ji Yun" researches and cuts, goes to Ji, doubts. ]
(1) A fish similar to salamander in ancient legends.
(2) A family of fish. The side of the body is flat, red or brown, with markings. The mouth is big and the teeth are thin. Live in the ocean.
